wordpressPage.title: Christmas (Christmas Jumpers)
wordpressPage.content:
Before this session challenge your group to come along wearing Christmas jumpers!

1 – Have a look at the various Christmas jumpers. Which one do you like the best? Why?

2 – Imagine an alien has landed on earth. What would they understand about Christmas from our jumpers?

3 – Show the image of the Christian Christmas jumper. What do they think? What does it tell us about Christmas? – Image 1 – Image 2Â 

(Suggested bible passage/story: Luke 1:30-33)
